channel.title: I need help please. *2 problems* NPC direction,NPC damage
channel.description:
I am using a ziddy based source, and I am tring to change it completely. On my way to doing this I came across two things I need help with.
1. Is there any way to change which direction a trade npc is facing? Mine are always facing north and there is nothing in the autospawn.cfg to change to make them look a different way. *Just need to know what file and what to change*
2. Is there anyway to change how high a npc is hitting? My NPC.cfg only has two colums.. Combat and Health.
If you could help and lead me in the right direction I would be greatful, thanks.

item.title: I need help please. *2 problems* NPC direction,NPC damage
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

Thanks, You run Zombiescape right?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help please. *2 problems* NPC direction,NPC damage
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

misc.random for the npc hits, in npcHandler.java

Read full topic
